Episodes.Title: St Hospitals
Episodes.Writer: Andrew O'Connor, Jesse Armstrong, Sam Bain
Episodes.Actors: David Mitchell, Robert Webb, Danny Babington
Episodes.Plot: Sophie is in hospital in labour and Mark isn't really sure how he can be of help. Jeremy starts fancying a girl he meets in the waiting room, however she isn't quite 100% available.

Episodes.Title: Nether Zone
Episodes.Writer: Jesse Armstrong, Sam Bain, David Mitchell
Episodes.Actors: David Mitchell, Robert Webb, Danny Babington
Episodes.Plot: Mark and Jeremy get trapped in a house on the day of Mark's baby's Christening.

Episodes.Title: Seasonal Beatings
Episodes.Writer: Jesse Armstrong, Sam Bain, David Mitchell
Episodes.Actors: David Mitchell, Robert Webb, Eliza L. Bennett
Episodes.Plot: Mark has his family over to the flat for Christmas dinner, as well as Dobby, who he is finally going out with, except he hasn't told his parents yet.

Episodes.Title: New Year's Eve
Episodes.Writer: Jesse Armstrong, Sam Bain, David Mitchell
Episodes.Actors: David Mitchell, Robert Webb, Camilla Beeput
Episodes.Plot: It's New Year's Eve. Mark wants to find Dobby and sort things out between them, Jeremy just wants to have a good time. However newly-single Zahra has invited Jeremy to move in with her.
